metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8836 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Integer overflow in the isofs_real_read_zf function in isofs.c in FuseISO 20070708 might allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a large ZF block size in an ISO file, leading to a heap-based buffer overflow.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8836` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

fuseiso - 20070708-3.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: fuseiso package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20070708-3.2').
